articles.content: Kylian Mbappe's main role as France captain will be to link the old and new generations of players in the squad, the Paris Saint-Germain forward said on Thursday in his first news conference since ge… [+1644 chars]

articles.author: Devendra Pandey
articles.title: India can play Pakistan at a neutral venue during Asia Cup: Pakistan Cricket Board’s proposal - The Indian Express
articles.description: This means all India matches will be outside Pakistan, while the rest of the games will be held in Pakistan, the hosts of the tournament.
articles.content: India can play archrivals Pakistan and other teams at a venue outside of Pakistan during the Asia Cup. This is according to a proposal of the Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB), the hosts of the tournament… [+2052 chars]
